title.heading: IF YOU ASKED JESUS INTO YOUR LIFE AS SAVIOUR AND LORD, MANY THINGS HAVE HAPPENED, INCLUDING:

button.buttontext: Jesus Has Come Into Your life

panel.text: Jesus has come into your life by the Holy Spirit and he will never leave you.
All your sins have been forgiven.

button.buttontext: You Are Now a Child of God

panel.text: You have become a child of God. He is your heavenly father.
God has given you new power to live a transformed life.

button.buttontext: You Are Now Friends with God

panel.text: You have started a friendship with God that will last forever.

page.question: But how do we know this actually happened?
